# GitHub Templates

This directory contains GitHub issue and pull request templates to help maintain consistency and gather necessary information when contributors interact with the repository.

## Templates

- **Bug Report** (`.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md`): Template for reporting bugs
- **Feature Request** (`.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md`): Template for suggesting new features
- **Pull Request** (`.github/pull_request_template.md`): Template for pull requests

These templates help ensure that all issues and PRs contain the necessary information for maintainers to effectively review and address them.
